alert.note: Alert for Cullman; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:24AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Marshall, Cullman and southeastern Morgan Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1224 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nesmith to 9 miles west of Dodge City to near Smith Dam. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Arab, Hanceville, Good Hope, Holly Pond, Dodge City, Baldwin, Vinemont, Baileyton and West Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
